Built In recently surveyed 1,000+ leaders nationwide to glean insights on what the tech talent industry is facing, the good and the bad. Unsurprisingly, tech hiring remains a top strategic priority, but the process is harder than ever: 75% of respondents note that tech recruitment has become more challenging. To attract this much needed talent, 62% of organizations are increasing international hiring and 56% are increasing their investments in employer branding. Built In is releasing the full findings in our 2024 State of the Talent Industry report soon.
